name: Design System Editor
description: Stage 6 editor. Define the visual foundation: color palettes, typography, spacing, border radius, shadows, and the application shell layout. Live preview updates as tokens change.

components.name: ColorTokenEditor
components.description: Three-palette editor for Primary, Secondary, and Neutral colors. Each palette shows a row of swatches (50-950 shades). Click a swatch to open color picker. AI generates harmonious palettes from a single seed color or mood keyword.

components.name: TypographyPreview
components.description: Shows heading, body, and mono font selections with live type specimens. Dropdown to select from web-safe and Google Fonts. Size scale preview.

components.name: SpacingScale
components.description: Visual spacing scale showing base unit and multipliers as colored bars. Editable base value.

components.name: RadiusShadowEditor
components.description: Border radius and shadow token editors with live preview boxes showing each token applied.

components.name: AppShellConfigurator
components.description: Visual layout builder for the application shell. Choose between sidebar/topbar/hybrid navigation. Configure sidebar width, collapse behavior, background color. Preview the shell layout with placeholder content.

components.name: ComponentPreview
components.description: Live preview panel showing common UI components (button, input, card, table row, badge) styled with the current design tokens. Updates in real-time as tokens change.

components.name: DualViewToggle
components.description: Toggle between Visual Editor, tokens.json preview, and CSS variables output.

interactions.behavior: AI creates full design system from mood keywords or product type
Open color picker → update palette → refresh all previews
Load new font → update typography preview
Update shell layout → refresh shell preview
All previewed components update as tokens change
